events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking shows no updates and the delivery is very delayed.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on the customer's message mentioning shipment delay and tracking concerns.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah J. for further investigation regarding the delayed order delivery.

We are closing this case as resolved. Thank you for your patience and please reach out if you have any other questions.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to you. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
